inclusion.criterion: treated with intravenous fluids in first trimester
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with diagnostic confounders such as overt hyperthyroidism, stomach disease,
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with chronic illness (e.g.Crohn's disease, colitis ulcerosa, chronic liver disease, diabetes, thyroid disfunction, hyperparathyroidism) and multigenerational pregnancies,
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with history of thyroid surgery, calcium and/or hormone producing tumours,
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with usage of steroids, antiepileptic drugs and/or low molecular weight heparin (long term medication known to affect bone metabolism) and also patients with history of steroid usage for fetal lung maturation.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients with history of osteoporosis, bone fracture in young ages in family.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: A 25-year-old pregnant woman with fever, chills, nausea, vomiting, dysuria, urgency, frequency, and flank pain. Urine culture shows Gram-negative rod-shaped bacterial cells, leukocytes, and leukocyte casts.
